lead_paragraph: After miraculously winning the the Little League champions of California, the team is invited to play an exhibition game at the Houston Astrodome with the local champs, the Toros. Kelly, the Bears' star player, decides to rejoin the team for the trip to Houston, where he confronts his estranged father, Mike.
